short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A quick way to prototype CSS :)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Kiss My CSS is the perfect tool for web developers and designers looking to quickly prototype and test out new CSS styles. With our extension, you can easily apply custom CSS to any webpage with just a few clicks.

One of the best features of Kiss My CSS is its real-time preview option, which allows you to see the changes you make to your styles immediately. This means you can fine-tune your styles and get them just right without having to constantly refresh the page.

In addition to previewing your changes in real-time, Kiss My CSS also includes a powerful code editor that makes it easy to write and edit your CSS. Whether you're a seasoned pro or a beginner, you'll find the editor intuitive and easy to use.

You can also get your CSS scripts from a file published online (eg. GitHub) to share your CSS. The format should be as described here: https://telegra.ph/Kiss-my-CSS-12-27
